title: Albert Gleizes
creator_credit: Les Films du Cypres and Pierre Alibert
brief_description: Presents the painter who, early in his career, began experimenting with structure to rediscover form, which eventually led to Cubism. Successive treatments of one subject painted by Gleizes are compared in their cubistic development and the laws of painting, which Gleizes defined, are demonstrated through examples in his own work.
